content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of split and involved a dispute over a property in croatia the case started in july 2014 and lasted for 7 years and 6 months the final resolution was that the coownership was dissolved and the property was divided between the parties one party referred to as mb was granted exclusive ownership and possession of the ground floor part of the courtyard while the other party also referred to as mb was granted exclusive ownership and possession of another part of the courtyard there was a small remaining common area in the courtyard the decision was based on the property act and involved the examination of land registry records and expert opinions on the value and division of the property
